ygData.subject: RE: Lute of the Gypsy Princess and other lutes.
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I ve heard a lot about how bad us bards do in duels and what not, but I just wanted to say that I beat my wizard friend who was 2 levels higher than me
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I've heard a lot about how bad us bards do in duels
and what not, but I just wanted to say that I beat my wizard friend who was
2 levels higher than me last night :-) Yippee!!!! The second time he used
faster casting spells and barely beat me. Anyway, I'm sure that this will
all change as we get higher leveled, but boy I'm going to enjoy it while it
lasts!

Tani, 17th bard
Halana 35th (forever) shaman

-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@...
[mailto:jhenders@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 11:57 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lute of the
Gypsy Princess and other lutes.

From: jhenders@...

On Tue, Nov 23/99, James Schuldes
<jgs@...> wrote:
>
> p.s.s. is it just me or how come Verant
has such a low opinion of bards?
> They design dungeons and populate them
with these mobs: knights, warriors,
> shamen, wizards, enchanters, etc. so
where do they put the bards? Hello a
> Sylly are you [interested] in helping
deliver some [mail]?

They probably can't think of any way to not
have an npc bard be a
pushover in combat. :)
